Pat has to deliver special jet boots to the school, built by Ted's inventor friend. Ted will demonstrate them. But on the way to Greendale, Pat stops to help Alf, whose cows have got loose. Pat sees Ajay, out for a day's bird-watching. Pat has promised to lend Ajay his wellies and asks Ajay to get them from the van, but Ajay takes the jet boots by mistake. By the time Pat realises the mixup, Ajay is airborne and can't control the powerful boots... Meanwhile Alf and Ted grow competitive as they try to win the kids' attention. Attempts to shout instructions to Ajay fail, but Pat realises Cedric could be the solution. The brave bird takes an instruction leaflet up to Ajay - who is then able to control the boots (using his toes) with ease! Meera, Julian and the others are delighted as Ajay touches down at Greendale School with the help of Cedric - the most welcome bird Ajay has ever watched!

Meanwhile more flying toys appear, first Fuse and then Smartysaurus. Noddy at last realises that Deltoid, Fuse and Smartysaurus were all in the middle of making a wish when the magic happened and that the culprit is Pat-Pat, who was using Queen Sparklewings' wand to try and make all her friends' wishes come true. programme.desc: When a ghost-fearing magician falls for his staffer, who happens to be haunted by her dead best friend, he must face his fears while convincing her he'd make an excellent boyfriend.

programme.title: Bring Me Home
programme.desc: A dedicated mother in search of her missing son follows a tip that leads her to a fishing village where corrupt police officers might have the answers to her mystery.

programme.title: Our Season
programme.desc: A fantasy drama about the miraculous moment of a mother coming down from the Heavens on a 3-day vacation and staying beside her daughter.

programme.title: Moonlit Winter
programme.desc: In winter, a mother and her daughter live together alone. The daughter, a high school student, accidentally reads a letter to her mother and finds out the secret her mother has been hiding all her life. So the beautiful journey of the mother and the daughter begins.

programme.title: The Golden Holiday
programme.desc: Byeong-Soo works as a detective in the countryside and takes his family on a trip to the Philippines. He becomes involved in a crime planned by Patric, becoming a murder suspect.

programme.title: LFRC: MET Gala 2025
programme.desc: Affectionately referred to as “fashion’s biggest night out,” the Met Gala 2025 is a fundraising benefit for the Metropolitan Museum of Art in New York City that is held every year on the first Monday in May. The event welcomes stars, young creatives, and industry paragons. The 2025 Met Gala will take place on Monday, May 5 and will celebrate the Costume Institute’s new exhibition, “Superfine: Tailoring Black Style.”

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Julian and the kids at Greendale School are excited about a Festival of flight - Ted's coming to talk about aviation and Alf's bringing Cedric the racing pigeon. Pat has to deliver special jet boots to the school, built by Ted's inventor friend. Ted will demonstrate them. But on the way to Greendale, Pat stops to help Alf, whose cows have got loose. Pat sees Ajay, out for a day's bird-watching. Pat has promised to lend Ajay his wellies and asks Ajay to get them from the van, but Ajay takes the jet boots by mistake. By the time Pat realises the mixup, Ajay is airborne and can't control the powerful boots... Meanwhile Alf and Ted grow competitive as they try to win the kids' attention. Attempts to shout instructions to Ajay fail, but Pat realises Cedric could be the solution. The brave bird takes an instruction leaflet up to Ajay - who is then able to control the boots (using his toes) with ease! Meera, Julian and the others are delighted as Ajay touches down at Greendale School with the help of Cedric - the most welcome bird Ajay has ever watched!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: When Noddy sees Deltoid flying in the air he decides to investigate: how can they get Deltoid down? Realising that magic is involved, Noddy goes to see Queen Sparklewings to see if she can help but she tells him her wand has gone missing. Someone must be trying to do magic with her wand! Meanwhile more flying toys appear, first Fuse and then Smartysaurus. Noddy at last realises that Deltoid, Fuse and Smartysaurus were all in the middle of making a wish when the magic happened and that the culprit is Pat-Pat, who was using Queen Sparklewings' wand to try and make all her friends' wishes come true. Reunited with her wand, Queen Sparklewings is able to bring down the toys. Another successful case for Noddy!

programme.desc: Nicholas Boyd, a writer, returns to his hometown and reminisces about the time he shared with his estranged uncle.

programme.title: I Don't Know How She Does It
programme.desc: Kate Reddy (Sarah Jessica Parker) manages the ultimate balancing act between work and her adoring family in this comedy based on the bestseller by Allison Pearson.

programme.title: Brothers
programme.desc: When his older brother goes missing in Afghanistan, Tommy, the family’s black-sheep, begins to care for his sister-in-law and nieces with consequences that will shake the foundation of the entire family.

programme.title: Marry Me
programme.desc: A betrayed pop star (Jennifer Lopez), slated to marry her pop star fiancé (Maluma) on stage, instead marries a stranger from the audience - a high school math teacher (Owen Wilson).

programme.title: Iron Squad 2
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean military survival show brings eight Special Force units together to compete in extreme missions that will test their physical stamina, mental strength and teamwork. Top male reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle till the end in front of five celebrity hosts!

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The Comeback
programme.desc: Uncle Hua is a retired agent who owns an antique shop on an old street. When the old street is forcibly demolished by the local Green Dragon Gang one day, Uncle Hua’s hidden identity is accidentally revealed, and he is pursued by a mysterious organization headed by Ah Jie. A fatal duel has just begun!

programme.title: Iron Squad 2
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean military survival show brings eight Special Force units together to compete in extreme missions that will test their physical stamina, mental strength and teamwork. Top male reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle till the end in front of five celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Cruel War
programme.desc: To combat the greenhouse effect, scientist Yan Xin attempts to plant newly developed super rubber seeds on a remote island, hoping to transform it into a thriving new land. Yan Xin's ex-husband decides to accompany her on this perilous journey. As conflicts arise, they encounter the local drug cartel, and a fatal battle is about to begin.

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms. Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yu into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Cao’s enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Bei’s concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Munitions Hijacking Case
programme.desc: Agent Wen is assigned to work undercover for a Southeast Asian military arm dealer to find some munitions and to destroy them. When he finally finds the munitions though, he is attacked by unknown gangsters and has to team up with his partner to recover the munitions so as to prevent a disaster from occurring.

programme.title: Totally Outnumbered
programme.desc: Totally Outnumbered is a unique Japanese variety game show where one supreme professional from a specific area of expertise faces off with a large group of amateurs in original competitions in each episode.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3

programme.title: CSI S3 E13 - Random Acts of Violence
programme.desc: The series enters its third season riding high as network television's top-rated drama. There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

programme.title: CSI S3 E15 - Lady Heather's Box
programme.desc: The series enters its third season riding high as network television's top-rated drama. There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

programme.desc: After the U.S. video game crash of 1983, a Japanese electronics company single-handedly resurrects the industry with a game featuring a jumping plumber.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: The discovery of the ancient site of Karahan Tepe in southern Turkey turns the world of archaeology on its head, displaying engineering skills far beyond what the people of the time were capable of.

programme.title: Beloved (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Friendship took a violent turn when Nora Aunor found herself a pawn in the intriguing games, being played by her close friend and employer, Hilda Koronel. How far would the bounds of friendship go?

programme.title: Misis Mo, Misis Ko
programme.desc: Two married couples, Dina and Edu and Jackie and Ricky, became close friends. The amorous merry-go-round came full circle when hurt at what she and he thought was betrayal.

programme.title: Captain Barbell (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Teng-Teng is an orphan who works by collecting junk from the streets. One day, as a rewards for his good deeds, he was given the magic barbel, which empowers him to be Captain Barbel.

programme.title: I Love You 3X A Day
programme.desc: An English teacher's students always play tricks on him because of his carabao English. He meets and falls in love with a fellow teacher.

programme.title: Roberta
programme.desc: Child actress Mumay Santiago gets her biggest break as she portrayed the title role in this remake of the Sampaguita Pictures' classic from the 50's. Roberta is a little girl forced to learn how to fend for herself because of her abusive and irresponsible father and ailing mother. When her mother died, Roberta is forced to live on the streets of the city where despite her many hardships, she managed to maintain a sunny disposition that enchants even strangers.

programme.title: Paradise Inn
programme.desc: A story about the relationship between a mother and her daughter in a situation where everybody is a snake and with vested interest.

programme.title: Nagalit Ang Buwan Sa Haba Ng Gabi
programme.desc: A story of married couples but leaves their own spouses for their relationship.

programme.title: Berdugo (Gabriel Lorenzo)
programme.desc: He is an honest and dedicated cop whose life shatters when a drug syndicate frames him up and massacres his family.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: A failed romance in the past between her mother and his father threatened the budding relationship between Sharon and Gabby, in this film, which was the very first movie produced by Viva Films.

programme.title: Sgt. Miguel Carpio: Multiple Murder
programme.desc: An exemplary policeman dedicates so much time to his duties that his wife begins to feel neglected.

programme.title: Ang Lahat Ng Ito Pati Na Ang Langit
programme.desc: Movie Queen Susan Roces made a rare screen appearance as a famous dress designer, who adopted the illegitimate daughter of one of her models, Dina Bonnevie. The little girl became her only joy after she turned into a recluse when she lost her fiancé to the same seemingly unstable Dina.

programme.title: Wanted: Perfect Mother
programme.desc: A dashing widower named Dante (Christopher De Leon) is scouting for a tutor for his daughter, then a girl named Sam (Regine Velasquez) walks in and turned their once lonely home into a carnival.

programme.title: Bitag (Babae at Bala)
programme.desc: Sgt. Nick Nobleza (Jestoni Alarcon) is the straightest cop in the police force. He is assigned to infiltrate the drug syndicate of Mr. Villafuerte. But Mr. Villafuerte is one step ahead as he sets up a trap of his own.

programme.title: YOKAI
programme.desc: This episode features the aquatic Namikozo, which warns locals in the area of the Enshu-nada Sea of coming changes in the weather by beating its drum to give waves a distinct, rumbling tone.

programme.title: CINEMATIC JOURNEY
programme.desc: Join our explorers as they pursue the cinematic beauty of Japan. Kyle Card hikes the newly designated long trail around majestic Mt. Fuji and discovers its secrets.

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini
programme.desc: The head Inari shrine has 30,000 subordinate shrines throughout Japan. Since its foundation in 711, the Inari deities attract worshippers with varying needs.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: DESIGN X STORIES
programme.desc: Today's theme: Design Hunting in Nagano. This central region once linked east and west Japan. Visit an art festival and a historic town, and explore the designs fostered by Nagano's fierce landscapes.

programme.title: u&i
programme.desc: This show for kids promotes a greater understanding for people with difficulties and helps develop empathy. With the help of two fairies, the main character thinks about what can be done to help.

programme.title: Texico
programme.desc: Learn the principles of programming without a computer. Animated characters provide fun and lucid explanations of 5 core processes: analysis, combination, generalization, abstraction, and simulation.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Train Cruise
programme.desc: Journey through valleys in northern Kyoto Pref. and admire grand spectacular the Sea of Japan. We ride attractive trains, learn about the culture and history, and visit places that appear in legends.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: For hundreds of years, Japanese people have used name stamps, known as hanko, to sign their name. In a 5-minute digest, we discover their history and explore what a hanko-free future might look like.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Spiritual Explorers
programme.desc: Japan lies in a volcanic zone and boasts over 3000 onsen. We visit two old hot springs to learn the significance of bathing to the Japanese spirit.

programme.title: JAPAN FROM ABOVE: UP CLOSE
programme.desc: This program takes you on an aerial journey across 21st century Japan. Enjoy the bird's-eye view of unique landscapes as well as intimate portraits of the people who inhabit the archipelago.

programme.title: BOSAI:Science that Can Save Your L
programme.desc: In 2021, digital twin technology analyzed a landslide in Atami and prevented further disasters. Find out how it is also used for tsunami prediction.

programme.desc: Peppa wins the top prize in a raffle at school: a trip in a hot air balloon. Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, George and Peppa climb aboard and enjoy the flight until the balloon gets caught in a tree. Luckily, the balloon has landed in a very familiar garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George love jumping in puddles, even when it’s raining – but when George takes off his rain hat, he catches a cold. After a while George is feeling much better. Now he’s more than happy to wear his rain hat, even when it’s not raining.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Pedro Pony wears glasses. Peppa thinks she might need glasses too, so Mummy Pig takes her to the optician. Peppa is a little disappointed to discover that she has perfect vision – but that doesn’t stop her wearing some rather fabulous sunglasses.

programme.title: Peppa Pig

programme.title: Peppa Pig

programme.desc: When Anna and Froga invite Ron to take a nap on their couch, they are surprised by his loud snores. They try everything they can to get him to stop (without disturbing his nap) and when they try to get Bubu's help, but Ron snores louder and louder!!

programme.desc: Holidays highlight our unique traditions, but when we mix clashing personalities and lots of alcohol, mayhem and memorable stories are sure to follow!

programme.desc: Officers Mack and Jack crash a failed football-viewing party, Kevin and Brooke use an important hacker's tool to secure a restaurant reservation, and it's mom versus dad in a race to determine peanut butter & jelly supremacy.

programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Biz Talk
programme.desc: A groundbreaking 30-minute interview show, giving an in-depth look into how top companies around the world conduct business and how policymakers view the fast-changing world economy. It presents 360 degree profiles of industry movers and shakers, tech mavericks and policymakers, and drills down on the stories behind their success, to give you clarity on what’s happening in every facet of business.

programme.title: The World Today

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. programme.title: ABC National News - Episode 130
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the day's top stories and latest news, with more reporters to tell you what's going on and why it matters. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: First Weapons - Leangle and Parrying Shield
programme.desc: Host Phil Breslin and weapon makers Brendan Kennedy and Trevor Kirby unpack the Leangle and Parrying Shield before honouring Aboriginal Cricketer Dick-a-Dick's crowd-pleasing demonstrations from 1868.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 9 - Port Adelaide v Adelaide Crows
programme.desc: ABC Australia brings you Australian Rules football live in your lounge room every week with coverage of the 2025 AFL Premiership Season.

programme.title: Mystery Road: Origin - Episode 4
programme.desc: Jay discovers Jack was deeply in debt and when Sputty also seems to be involved he becomes suspicious. Jay and Mary grow closer, Anousha acts for Ziggy and the Kelly Gang unexpectedly strikes again.

programme.title: Asia News Week - Episode 16
programme.desc: Yvonne Yong brings you a weekly roundup of the stories making news across the Asia region, plus what's trending on social media and making an impact on the culture and the way people live.

programme.title: Planet America: Weekend Edition - Episode 13
programme.desc: Join John Barron and Chas Licciardello as they take a deeper look at the people, issues and politics driving America this week. Plus longer interviews and in-depth discussions on the second Trump presidency.

programme.title: The World This Week - Episode 17
programme.desc: Girish Sawlani brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: A Brief History Of Cricket Down Und - Game Changers
programme.desc: During the 90s a group of players appeared on the scene whose influence on the game was mesmerising and their mercurial magic was so powerful it impacted teammates, results and even the rules of the game.

programme.title: Stuff The British Stole - World's Biggest Diamond
programme.desc: Marc Fennell delves into South Africa's first diamond mine and the opulent realms of London to uncover the intriguing tale of how the largest gem-quality diamond ultimately reached the hands of the British Royal family.

programme.title: First Weapons - Leangle and Parrying Shield
programme.desc: Host Phil Breslin and weapon makers Brendan Kennedy and Trevor Kirby unpack the Leangle and Parrying Shield before honouring Aboriginal Cricketer Dick-a-Dick's crowd-pleasing demonstrations from 1868.

programme.desc: Jay discovers Jack was deeply in debt and when Sputty also seems to be involved he becomes suspicious. Jay and Mary grow closer, Anousha acts for Ziggy and the Kelly Gang unexpectedly strikes again.

programme.title: The World This Week - Episode 17
programme.desc: Girish Sawlani brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: Culture By Design - Episode 4
programme.desc: Featuring ceramists, street artists, fashion designers, architects, furniture makers, weavers and more; this series explores universal appeal of 'good design' across Asia. Hosted by Australian design expert, Anthony Burke.

programme.title: I Was Actually There - The Beatles' World Record Adelaide Visit
programme.desc: When The Beatles flew into Adelaide, they had no idea that the biggest crowd they would ever witness was waiting for them. Fans describe the life-changing experience of seeing the biggest band in the world arrive.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast - Episode 19
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim, plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Insiders - Episode 15
programme.desc: Start your Sunday morning with the show the politicians rely on to find out what's going on. David Speers presents Australia's must-watch political program, joined by a panel of the best political analysts and commentators.

programme.title: Offsiders - Episode 14
programme.desc: Host Abbey Gelmi and a panel of leading sportswriters, commentators and athletes examine the big issues and major results in sport. Offsiders unpacks all the action, both on and off the field.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show - Episode 12
programme.desc: Join Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: ABC News - Episode 38
programme.desc: The latest from ABC News on the weekend, bringing you the day's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: On Country Kitchen - Episode 2
programme.desc: It's season 2 and Derek still can't cook! With locally found ingredients, and a sprinkle of culture and character, Mark and Derek create an Indigenous-inspired feast for the people they visit along their journey.

programme.title: Paradise Kitchen Bali - Episode 8
programme.desc: Discover the delicious and nutritious world of tofu with Lauren as she experiments with textures and flavors pushing the soybean to its limits. Creating dishes like Scramble tofu and the sweet-spicy delight of Tahu Gejrot.

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: The life story of heavyweight boxing champion Muhammad Ali, following the champ's early days as Cassius Clay and his rise in sports and politics, including his controversial refusal to fight in the Vietnam War and his infamous comeback battles.

programme.title: The Lovely Bones
programme.desc: When 14-year-old Susie Salmon was murdered, she left her unfinished life behind. But now from her place in a strange but beautiful in-between world, she must help her father catch her killer and protect her family before she can finally move on. Filled with thrilling suspense, hope and the redeeming power of love.

programme.desc: Sick of his dead end, white bred existence, Jack encounters an intriguing stranger who alters his relationship with reality.

programme.title: Children Of A Lesser God

programme.title: Echoes Of Change
programme.desc: Indonesia's rural economies are transforming, thanks to a new generation of youth. Discover why and how they are seizing the latest opportunities to build a brighter future in their hometowns.

programme.title: She is in Danger
programme.desc: After a fight with her boyfriend, Xue leaves home to stay in a remote B&B accommodation, together with a roommate Yi. One night, Xue accidentally discovers that Yi and another friend have killed Yi's ex-boyfriend, and is locked up by the duo so as to cover up the murder. Xue's buddy, Wen, comes seeking for her - can Xue and Wen escape from danger?

programme.title: Bahay Na Pula
programme.desc: Jane and her husband Marco go to the ancestral house that Jane inherited from her grandmother. As they move into the house, Jane starts to experience horrifying events and her belly mysteriously grows bigger every day, as if she has gotten pregnant all of a sudden…

programme.title: Beast Mode
programme.desc: A Hollywood director accidentally kills his leading actor and has to find an exact duplicate to proceed with the filming. To do that, he must agree to an evil pact which unleashes a band of bloodthirsty, shape-shifting, ferocious beasts onto L.A…

programme.title: Inside The Boys
programme.desc: Adapted from a true paranormal event, it is said that people working in the morgue at midnight encounter haunted events as many dead bodies are kept in the college hospital. When a few medical students experience a series of horrifying incidents after leaving the morgue at midnight, the campus is shrouded in terror.

programme.title: Wang Fam
programme.desc: Boo is a human marrying an aswang, Malou, to save her life, but he soon turns into an aswang as well to escape the pursue of other aswangs. After having three children, Boo and Malou decide to start a more normal and less monstrous family life in Manila. Can they start anew?

programme.title: The Windmill Massacre
programme.desc: Jennifer joins a tour to explore the renowned windmills of the Netherlands. As their tour coach breaks down on the way, they seek refuge in a creepy shed near a sinister windmill with a dark history. When some tour members suddenly disappear, Jennifer discovers a shared secret among them, linking their fates in a chilling revelation.

programme.title: Night Watch
programme.desc: After a car accident erases his memory, Wang Ren Jie takes on a job as a night guard. As the clock strikes midnight, he reports for duty at the abandoned building, only to find three lost souls awaiting him, and unravels a revenge plot at the same time. Is this fate or a curse cast by vengeful spirits?

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A high school cheerleader, Ashley, is adopted by the killers who murdered her parents. She is horrified to find out the truth during a home robbery years later, and must choose to either escape or be part of this family for good.

programme.title: Inside The Boys
programme.desc: Adapted from a true paranormal event, it is said that people working in the morgue at midnight encounter haunted events as many dead bodies are kept in the college hospital. When a few medical students experience a series of horrifying incidents after leaving the morgue at midnight, the campus is shrouded in terror.

programme.title: Wang Fam
programme.desc: Boo is a human marrying an aswang, Malou, to save her life, but he soon turns into an aswang as well to escape the pursue of other aswangs. After having three children, Boo and Malou decide to start a more normal and less monstrous family life in Manila. Can they start anew?

programme.title: The Windmill Massacre
programme.desc: Jennifer joins a tour to explore the renowned windmills of the Netherlands. As their tour coach breaks down on the way, they seek refuge in a creepy shed near a sinister windmill with a dark history. When some tour members suddenly disappear, Jennifer discovers a shared secret among them, linking their fates in a chilling revelation.

programme.title: Night Watch
programme.desc: After a car accident erases his memory, Wang Ren Jie takes on a job as a night guard. As the clock strikes midnight, he reports for duty at the abandoned building, only to find three lost souls awaiting him, and unravels a revenge plot at the same time. Is this fate or a curse cast by vengeful spirits?

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A high school cheerleader, Ashley, is adopted by the killers who murdered her parents. She is horrified to find out the truth during a home robbery years later, and must choose to either escape or be part of this family for good.

programme.title: Inside The Boys

programme.title: Wang Fam
programme.desc: Boo is a human marrying an aswang, Malou, to save her life, but he soon turns into an aswang as well to escape the pursue of other aswangs. After having three children, Boo and Malou decide to start a more normal and less monstrous family life in Manila. Can they start anew?

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: A Florida woman hides in her bathroom when a strange man breaks into her home in the middle of the night. A man trapped in his overturned truck calls 911 in a panic as the vehicle fills with icy water.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: In 2019, Jim's daughter, Elesha, lost her job and needed a place to stay so she moved. Moving in with Jim however, dealing with the hoard has been the most difficult part of her life.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Shocking first-hand accounts of people who were manipulated, abused, and finally broke free before it was too late. We'll hear from former members of Gwen Shamblin's Remnant Fellowship, and more.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S1)
programme.desc: Every day, tens of thousands of people get booked into jails all across the country for crimes both big and small. 'Booked: First Day In' is their side of the story.

programme.title: Court Cam (S6)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments. A defendant claims she's the wife of a prince; a church pastor gets sentenced for running an unlicensed funeral business; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S6)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments. A defendant flips off a judge; a baby interrupts a hearing; a mom sounds off on one of the men responsible for her daughter's death; and more.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest
programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country. A naked man allegedly steals an ATV; a man who apparently was feeding the alligators gets a visit from police; and more.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest
programme.desc: A man proposes to his girlfriend while getting arrested; an aquarium worker helps catch a shark thief; a horse & buggy turns dangerous when a drunk man is operating it; and more.

programme.title: The First 48 (S25)
programme.desc: A visit to Mobile ends in tragedy when a violent chain reaction leads to the death of a teenage girl.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: A Mobile mother goes missing after blowing millions at the casino. At trial, the DA and detective take a gamble of their own to bring her killer to justice.

programme.title: Digital Addiction
programme.desc: Wade is addicted to gaming. With no job and no income, he is on the verge of eviction. Alexis, 21, has been a cell phone junkie ever since she got her first phone at nine years old.

programme.title: 60 Days In (S8)
programme.desc: Jamil and Steven enter general population, and as a new volunteer enters the Pitt County Detention Center, another participant questions their decision to continue with the program.

programme.title: Escapades En Suisse Italienne
programme.desc: Plunge into the heart of Ticino to discover enchanting places, explore new hiking trails, enjoy various sports and leisure activities, and savor exceptional local products. A sensory journey through unique and authentic experiences!

programme.title: Hep Taxi !
programme.desc: In town or in the countryside, day or night, Jérôme Colin, the presenter-taxi driver leads his prestigious customer on a four-wheel journey conducive to secrets.

programme.title: La Suisse Des Lacs
programme.desc: Spring has arrived in the Trois-Lacs-Jura region, and life returns to Lake Morat, Lake Neuchâtel and Lake Bienne. We meet Patrick, aboard the ''Romandie I''. In the Bernese Oberland, between the alpine lakes of Brienz and Thoune, Interlaken welcomes its tourists.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: Direction for to visit Rodin's home and studio. Ceramic artist Grégoire Scalabre sculpts and accumulates to enter another dimension, between tiny and gigantic. The John Galliano show for Maison Margiela: a journey through time and the strange. Artist Amandine Antunes masters the stucco marble technique.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Suisse En Scène
programme.desc: Interview with a key figure from the Swiss cultural scene. An opportunity to look back at their life and career, and the foundations that underpin their work.

programme.title: Falò
programme.desc: A news magazine show, ''Falò'' discusses and analyses current affairs in depth.

programme.title: Rugby - Top 14
programme.desc: French Rugby Union Championship match (Top 14).

programme.title: Rugby - Top 14
programme.desc: French Rugby Union Championship match (Top 14).

programme.title: Tendance Xxi
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Dj Battle Africa - La Finale
programme.desc: The third battle of this new season sees the Rwandan DJ Caspi facing off against the Burkinabe DJ Nexus. Who will earn their place in the semi-finals?

programme.title: Meurtres Au Mont-Saint-Michel
programme.desc: After visiting the exorcist priest in Mont-Saint-Michel, a building site supervisor is found with a hole in his skull identical to that of Bishop Aubert, who founded the abbey in 709! Police Captain Sophie Maliquot takes over the case with its mix of exorcism, revenge and family revelations...

programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: Direction for to visit Rodin's home and studio. Ceramic artist Grégoire Scalabre sculpts and accumulates to enter another dimension, between tiny and gigantic. The John Galliano show for Maison Margiela: a journey through time and the strange. Artist Amandine Antunes masters the stucco marble technique.

programme.title: Cambodge, La Magie Khmère
programme.desc: From legendary temples to idyllic beaches, Cambodia is brimming with treasures. Steeped in rituals and beliefs, the country has found its own route to modernisation, as its capital city, Phnom Penh, clearly demonstrates. Far from urban hustle and bustle, Cambodians protect their natural and artistic heritage and their age-old culture.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: The body of Firmin Boyer, rum producer, has been found on the sugar cane plantation belonging to his competitor, Shantou Kumari. Relations between the two men had been tense, making Kumari the prime suspect. Until he in turn is found dead...

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: The rum industry is suffering from all today's agricultural problems, with customers wanting ever more value for money. The two families of planters are opponents, competitors and hate one another. Despite the discord within the team caused by Gaspard's problem with alcohol, the investigation advances steadily towards a terrible reality.

programme.title: Terra Artistika
programme.desc: The sculptures created by Agnès Baillon, almost always women, capture our gaze for an exchange steeped in humanity. From Parisian workshop to art gallery, scenes from everyday life displayed free of artifice but rich in nuance.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Merci Professeur !
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Terriennes
programme.desc: The ''Terriennes'' portal: a site in French on the status of women around the world. The site: www.tv5monde.com/terriennes

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'Invité
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Les Jeux De La Fontaine
programme.desc: During the wrestling competition, Rabbit shows a total lack of respect for his opponent by deliberately standing on Fox's tail.

programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy, Les Infos Noisettes
programme.desc: How do bees make honey? What do mushrooms do at the foot of trees? Why is there always water running in the river? Edmond and Lucy try to discover the fascinating world around them thanks to Edouard and his encyclopaedia.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: 1001 Moyen-Âges
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: Super Plex
programme.desc: Super Plex is no ordinary cucumber: he dreams of becoming a super-hero! And he's ready to do whatever it takes to achieve his aim, despite his not particularly practical oblong shape. With the help of friends as tenacious as himself, he confronts the challenges necessary to reach his objective.

programme.title: Sam & Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Idéfix Et Les Irréductibles
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idéfix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Idéfix Et Les Irréductibles
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idéfix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Le Petit Geek
programme.desc: What exactly does an influencer do? How do you create a video game? Why are screens dangerous, and what about digital identities? In each episode children shed light on today's virtual world.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Comme Des Têtes Pas De Poule
programme.desc: Upset by his family's financial problems and worried about failing his geography test, Félix counts on the powers of a ''magic'' rock. Meanwhile, Vic receives an anonymous love letter and tries to discover the secret author.

programme.title: Ernest Et Célestine, La Collection
programme.desc: Ernest, a grumpy bear with a generous heart, offers a home to Célestine, a mischievous little orphan mouse, in his tumbledown house. Two friends with characters as different as their size; but that doesn't stop them enjoying endless adventures filled with fun and fantasy.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Territoires De France
programme.desc: Discovering the treasures of the French regions, the initiatives and people who bring them to life.

programme.title: Basik
programme.desc: The programme which explores and explains the economy, examines our relationship to money and analyses our purchasing power. The economic, social and environmental challenges of tomorrow are covered in a direct, down-to-earth and occasionally mischievous manner!

programme.title: À Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: ''ABE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.desc: Divertissement

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: The family tries to help Bobby get over his test taking anxieties. // Carl gets lost in the city zoo after sneaking away from his family, in search of Keyon, the Komodo dragon.

programme.title: The Really Loud House
programme.desc: Still on the quest to give Charlie the perfect gift to remember him by Lincoln and his family put all of their talents on the line for the first ever Loud-a-palooza to save Flip's food and fuel.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: After a training accident causes a glitch in Chloe's powers, Max and Phoebe look for a cure. After Max thinks he's solved the issue, he allows Chloe to attend a party with friends, but his treatment creates brand new powers Chloe can't control.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: When Danger Force's fingerprints show up on crime scene evidence, they must break into police headquarters and wipe the prints, or their secret identities--and Danger Force itself--will be ruined.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: When a dangerous piñata ends up at a kid’s birthday party, Kid Danger and Captain Man must go undercover and step in before it’s too late.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: When Ray hears that Piper is going to Junior Anger Management to work on her anger issues, he makes a wager with Henry that he can make her lose her temper before the night ends.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: After failing to make Chef Guy Grazer a meal on his show, the kids try to erase the footage before it airs. // The kids search all over Royal Woods to find the missing furniture they left outside while cleaning.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln and Clyde submit an Ace Savvy comic to a meet-the-creator contest, but are foiled by a surprising nemesis. // When Lana brings home a new pet, who the kids adore, the four original Loud pets scheme to get rid of him.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Eager to be named Kings of the Con at the Ace Savvy convention, Lincoln and Clyde convince the sisters to go with them as the Full Deck. // But the girls get more attention, leading the boys to do whatever it takes to gain focus.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Mikey and Genghis Frog are sent into the storm on a supply run to the local market when they encounter the electrifying LEE THE EEL! Now Mikey has to step up and be a LEADER!

programme.desc: Karen tells the fairytale of a nerd trying to steal an action figure from his three little neighbors.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob meets a magical fish. // SpongeBob cooks in the big leagues.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Lady Upturn introduces Squidward, and his musical "talents", to her high society friends after she becomes his patron. // Squidward sets out to prove that aliens aren't real...until he has a close encounter of his own.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob experiences a bad luck streak when his lucky tie clip suddenly goes missing. // When Patrick can't fall asleep, he seeks assistance from the Sandman.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: After the Science Scouts begin selling biscuits to fund a trip to Mars, Mr. Krabs joins the ring and turns it into a competition. // When a competitor threatens to shut down Mrs. Puff's boating school, she must rely on SpongeBob to stay in business.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Tired of doing grunt work at the Krusty Krab, Squidward takes a new job as Manager of Weenie Hut Jr's. // Squidward gets trapped in an elevator with SpongeBob and Patrick on his way to return a nearly overdue library book.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: The family tries to help Bobby get over his test taking anxieties.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
